text: is there a reason why html is not automatically minified and css and js are?

It would be cool if the CMS made it easy to create custom RSS feeds. One use case would be to use a HubSpot blog for podcasts. So an author can attach an .mp3 to a post then have a feed created they can copy and paste to submit to apple <https://help.apple.com/itc/podcasts_connect/#/itcbaf351599>
